title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Hanja Concept Expansion Education Using Comparative Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Recognition of at least 50 basic Chinese characters
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners explain the principles of Chinese character composition (radicals/strokes) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners distinguish 10 pairs of similar-looking Chinese characters, reducing errors to 15% or less.
Learners interpret 20 mathematical terms in Chinese characters (漢字) contextually by applying contrastive learning strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
